DEFECT.DESCRIPTION:
Potential Underflow using expression '* (p - 2)' PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer accessed is ss::a PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer is of length 1024 bytes [size of field] PREFAST_NEWLINE Accessing the byte at byte offset {d % 1024}`50 - 2 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Values of variables: PREFAST_NEWLINE Pointer p is at offset {d % 1024}`50 bytes from the start of the buffer PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE where PREFAST_NEWLINE d`48 >= 0 PREFAST_NEWLINE {d % 1024}`50 <= 1023 PREFAST_NEWLINE {d % 1024}`50 <= d`48 PREFAST_NEWLINE {d % 1024}`50 >= 1 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Underflow access occurs when PREFAST_NEWLINE {d % 1024}`50 == 1 PREFAST_NEWLINE d`48 >= 1 PREFAST_NEWLINE
